columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: INSURANCE_SOURCE_OF_PAY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the financial source of payment for this coverage.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Medicare


Medicaid


Miscellaneous/Other


Self-Pay


No Payment, Other

columns.name: INSURANCE_DO_NOT_BILL_YN
columns.description:
Stores whether or not this insurance indicates "Do not bill insurance".


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: INSURANCE_CHECKSUM
columns.description: This column stores the checksum of the externally received insurance information.

columns.name: INSURANCE_SOURCE_CSN
columns.description: Stores a contact serial number (CSN) pointer to the Document Exchange record where externally received insurance information originated.
